name: The EYE (B.C. Studios)
description:
The Ultimate Sci-Fi Platformer Game to finalize your mechanics!

The EYE is a game that you need to skilled to finish! You need to climb the platform the EYE stands on using your gun that teleports you where ever you shoot and your thrusters. Be careful tho, not touching a disabled (grey) cube or the ground.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Thruster Force - Space
  • Slow Motion - Left Shift
  • Shoot - Left Mouse Button
  • Pause Menu - Escape

Controls can be changed in settings.
